    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_8aa612d1a6ba068f952ecbb2a69d7dde490e3a03</entry>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_8aa612d1a6ba068f952ecbb2a69d7dde490e3a03</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Relays in Morse code signal transmission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relais in der Morsealphabetsignalübertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Relais dans la transmission de signal de code 
Morse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relés na transmissão do sinal do código Morse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Relè nella trasmissione del segnale di codice 
Morse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρονόμοι στη μετάδοση σημάτων κώδικα Μορς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Relais en la transmisión de la señal del código
Morse</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the use of relay in Morse code signal transmission. To maintain the strong current to make the buzzer work, relays are placed in between small wires.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">morse code</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">relays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Gebrauch des Relais in 
der Morsealphabetsignalübertragung. Um den starken Strom 
beizubehalten um das Tonsignal arbeiten zu lassen, werden Relais 
zwischen kleinen Leitungen plaziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'utilisation du relais 
dans la transmission de signal de code Morse. Pour mettre à 
jour le courant fort pour faire fonctionner le vibreur, des relais 
sont placés entre de petits fils.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o uso do relé na 
transmissão do sinal do código Morse. Para manter a corrente 
forte para fazer a cigarra trabalhar, os relés são colocados dentro 
entre fios pequenos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'uso del relè nella 
trasmissione del segnale di codice Morse. Per effettuare la 
corrente forte per fare funzionare il cicalino, i relè sono disposti 
fra i piccoli legare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη χρήση του ηλεκτρονόμου
στη μετάδοση σημάτων κώδικα Μορς. Για να διατηρήσουν το 
ισχυρό ρεύμα για να κάνουν την εργασία σειρήνων, οι ηλεκτρονόμοι
τοποθετούνται μεταξύ των μικρών καλωδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el uso del relais en la 
transmisión de la señal del código Morse. Para mantener la 
corriente fuerte para hacer que la señal sonora trabaja, los relais 
se colocan entre los alambres pequeños.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Morsealphabet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitungen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
